inbound_adapter.description: Receives external messages (HTTP, RF, serial) and normalizes them

translator.description: Maps external semantics to internal representations and vice versa
translator.notes: [speculative_addition]: Internal translation strategies may include learned adapters with deterministic audited outputs; see speculative_reasoning.

outbound_sanitizer.description: Ensures no internal-only details leak externally; applies content filters and policy checks

audit_logger.description: Records full metadata and sanitized content for all messages
